Title: Egyptian, Congolese contenders vie for UNESCO top job
Summary: Egyptian ex-minister is the favourite to become head of the UN’s culture agency . But his Congolese rival says bets are still off before a key decision next week . The vote to replace outgoing French UNESCO director-general Audrey Azoulay after the election is set to take place .

Title: Kwara warns residents to be vigilant as security forces target kidnappers
Summary: Authorities in Kwara State have warned residents in parts of the state to remain vigilant and restrict unnecessary movements . Security forces are intensifying operations against kidnappers across several local government areas . The advisory was issued Wednesday by the Commissioner for Communications .

Title: Adekunle Gold returns to Nigerian roots with new ‘Fuji’ album
Summary: Nigerian singer Adekunle Gold returns to his roots on Friday with the release of his sixth album, "Fuji". The singer's sixth album will be released on Friday .

Title: Chelsea target Flying Eagles’ star, Kamaldeen
Summary: Chelsea have been linked with a move for Flying Eagles’ midfielder, Abduljelil Kamaldeen . According to a report from the UK online media, The Sun, Chelsea are interested in signing the midfielder from the Kwara Football Academy .

Title: River Niger tragedy in Kogi: 24 rescued, 14 dead, 42 missing, says NEMA
Summary: The National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA) confirmed that 24 passengers were rescued, 14 bodies recovered . 42 people remain missing following a boat accident on the River Niger in Ibaji Local Government Area, Kogi State .

Title: Four wounded, suspect shot in Manchester synagogue attack
Summary: The incident came on the Jewish Yom Kippur holiday and days ahead of the second anniversary of the October 7, 2023 attacks on Israel .

Title: Oyo NMA suspends strike after Makinde’s intervention
Summary: Makinde visited LAUTECH Teaching Hospital on Sept. 30, where he pledged to settle promotion arrears . He pledged to pay the minimum wage award in three equal instalments .

Title: Fubara’s Suspension: Court dismisses suit against Tinubu
Summary: The suspension announced on March 18, which followed the declaration of a State of Emergency in Rivers State, elapsed on September 18 . Tinubu's suspension was announced after declaration of an emergency in Rivers state .

Title: Trade Fair demolition: LASG denies ethnic targeting, urges traders to obey law
Summary: Trade Fair demolition: LASG denies ethnic targeting, urges traders to obey law . Commissioner explained that several structures inside the complex were erected without statutory approvals, some in clear violation of safety standards .

Title: ADC cautions against proposed amendments to PIA, sale of NNPCL
Summary: ADC cautions against proposed amendments to PIA, sale of NNPCL . "It would mean that Nigeria, a country that once stood as a giant of energy in Africa, would wake up tomorrow without control over its own resources," he said .
